CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 24, 1961, pg. A14 reads: "Rose Milton Ceramics - Rose Milton, well-known teacher of ceramics, won 14 ribbons for herself and her students, including first prize in hobby sculpture, at the show. Her husband, Robert Milton, is treasurer of the Pittsylvania Ceramic Guild.  Mrs. Milton demonstrated the art of making jewelry, during the show.  Left to right: Carrie Carter, Bernice Harper (prize winner) and Rose Milton."
TitMainTitle: Carrie Carter, Bernice Harper, and Rose Milton, standing behind table with ceramic art and prize ribbons for Pittsylvania Ceramic Guild show, Penn Sheraton Hotel
